title: Why We (Mostly) Stopped Messing With Shakespeare’s Language
text:
Why We (Mostly) Stopped Messing With Shakespeare’s Language 
Published By: Digg.com - Today 
Critics of a project that will translate Shakespeare’s plays into modern English may have forgotten the long history of the Bard’s scrip...
